gw.plugin.approval

Interface ITransactionSetApprovalPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ITransactionSetApprovalPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserGroupPair getApprovingUser(User user, TransactionSet transactionSet)
      Returns the user and group to which an approval activity should be assigned.
      ApprovalResult requiresApproval(User user, TransactionSet transactionSet)
      Determines whether approvable items, as submitted (or last approved) by the given user, require further approval.

    • Method Detail

      • requiresApproval

        ApprovalResult requiresApproval(User user,
                                TransactionSet transactionSet)
        Determines whether approvable items, as submitted (or last approved) by the given user, require further approval. Typically, there should be at least one user in the system for whom this method returns false, in order to prevent items from being unapprovable.
        Parameters:
        user - Identifies the user who is submitting the items initially or who last approved them. For example, when A submits a reserve change, A will be the user passed to this method. When B, A's supervisor, approves the reserve change, this method will be called again with B as the user, to determine whether further approval is required.
        transactionSet - The items to be approved or rejected.
        Returns:
        A non-null structure indicating whether the user has authority to submit the batch at all and, if so, whether if the items in the batch require further approval (and why), in which case getApprovingUser will be called. Otherwise, the items will be submitted immediately.

      • getApprovingUser

        UserGroupPair getApprovingUser(User user,
                               TransactionSet transactionSet)
        Returns the user and group to which an approval activity should be assigned.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who initially submitted the items, or the user who last approved them. See requiresApproval for a sample call sequence.
        transactionSet - The items to be approved or rejected. They are passed to this method to support logic based on attributes of the items being submitted.
        Returns:
        A non-null structure indicating the user and group to which the approval activity should be assigned.
